titles: A Pindarick ode on New-Year's-Day perform'd by vocal and instrumental musick before Their Sacred Majesties, K. William and Q. Mary / set by Dr. John Blow, and written by Thomas D'Urfey.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
Blow, John, d. 1708.
notes: Ode by D'Urfey; music lost.  Cf. New Grove.
First line of text: Behold, how all the stars give way.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
